title: Rosemary

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - You may infuse a player at night, granting them Basic defense.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you infuse a player they will have Roleblock and Control immunity that night.
- If your target is attacked you cannot infuse a player the next night.
- You cannot be roleblocked or controlled.

fields.name: Notifications:
fields.value:
"You have decided to protect (player)."
"Your target was attacked!"
"You are gathering resources."

"You were attacked but someone distracted your attacker!"
"Someone tried to roleblock you but you are immune!"
"A Witch tried to control you but you are immune."

desc:
Post 162
*You are an eccentric naturopath who keeps others focused with incense.*
